subdisciplines.name: Acting
subdisciplines.description: The art of performing roles in theater, film, or television productions.

subdisciplines.name: Screenwriting
subdisciplines.description: The art of writing scripts for film, television, or video games.

subdisciplines.name: Cinematography
subdisciplines.description: The art and technique of capturing visual images on camera for film or video.

subdisciplines.name: Editing
subdisciplines.description: The process of selecting and combining shots into sequences, and ultimately creating a finished film or video.
